name: Commode
maker: Adrien Faizelot-Delorme, and restored later by Nicolas Petit
description: Commode; Adrien Faizelot-Delorme (French, died after 1783, active 1748 - 1783, master 1748), and restored later by Nicolas Petit (French, 1732 - 1791, master 1761); Paris, France; about 1755; Fir poplar and oak veneered with tulipwood and kingwood; gilt-bronze mounts; lumachella pavonazza marble top; 90.1 x 144.8 x 66.6 cm (35 1/2 x 57 x 26 1/4 in.); 70.DA.79; Gift of J. Paul Getty; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Commode
medium: Fir poplar and oak veneered with tulipwood and kingwood; gilt-bronze mounts; lumachella pavonazza marble top
